name: Prioritised To-Do List (Eisenhower Matrix)
description: Do you feel overwhelmed with the amount of items in your evergrowing to-do list? Does it stress you out to even look at it? Do you feel unable to make an informed decision on what to tackle first?Don't despair, the Eisenhower Matrix and this Notion template can help you with that! This framework will help you improve your time management and productivity by providing you with guidance you on how to prioritise your to-do's.What is the Eisenhower MatrixThe Eisenhower Matrix is task management and
features: Urgent + Important = Do Now; Not Urgent + Important = Schedule; Urgent + Not Important = Delegate; Not Urgent + Not Important = Eliminate; Tasks database; Eisenhower matrix view of tasks; Kanban with tasks organised by status; List view of tasks due today, due within the next 7 days and overdue; Who is this template for?; How do I get access to this template?
